duties_responsibilities.duty: Acting as the single-point-of-contact for assigned customer accounts
Managing the entire order life cycle to ensure orders are processed on time
Taking ownership of and resolving complex customer inquiries
Maintaining accurate records of all internal and external interactions
Ensuring customers comply with export policies
Act as liaison between the customer and aftermarket and/or manufacturing location
Preparing and distributing standard and customized internal and customer reports
Supporting Customer Order Management departmental goals and initiatives
